data.title: New national and regional Annex I Habitat records: from #83 to #101
data.meta_description: New Italian data on the distribution of 17 Annex I Habitats are reported in this contribution. Specifically, 11 new occurrences in Natura 2000 sites are presented and 30 new cells are added in the EEA 10 km × 10 km reference grid. The new data refer to the Italian administrative regions of Apulia, Campania, Calabria, Lazio, Sardinia, Sicily and Tuscany.

Habitats records

#83 Annex I Habitat: 1410 Mediterranean salt meadows (Juncetalia maritimi) (Mascia F, Orrù I)

#84. Annex I Habitat: 2110 Embryonic shifting dunes (Rivieccio G, Caria MC, Bagella S)

#85. Annex I Habitat: 2110 Embryonic shifting dunes (Morabito A, Musarella CM, Spampinato G)

#86. Annex I Habitat: 2120 Shifting dunes along the shoreline with Ammophila arenaria (white dunes) (Caria MC, Serra S, Orrù G)

#87. Annex I Habitat: 3140: Hard oligo-mesotrophic waters with benthic vegetation of Chara spp. (Mei G, Stinca A)

#88. Annex I Habitat: 3150 Natural euthrophic lakes with Magnopotamion or Hydrocharition-type vegetation (Cannucci S, Fiaschi T, Angiolini C)

#89. Annex I Habitat: 3150 Natural euthrophic lakes with Magnopotamion or Hydrocharition-type vegetation (Tomaselli V, Todaro F, Pazienza G)

#90. Annex I Habitat: 3170* Mediterranean Temporary Ponds (Cuccaro VC, Fanelli G, La Montagna D)

#91. Annex I Habitat: 3240 - Alpine rivers and their ligneous vegetation with Salix eleagnos (Patera G, Gennai M)

#92. Annex I Habitat: 3260 Water courses of plain to montane levels with the Ranunculion fluitantis and Callitricho-Batrachion vegetation (Fanfarillo E, Fiaschi T, Angiolini C)

#93. Annex I Habitat: 3280 Constantly flowing Mediterranean rivers with Paspalo-Agrostidion species and hanging curtains of Salix and Populus alba (de Simone L, Mascia F, Angiolini C)

#94. Annex I Habitat: 5230*: Arborescent matorral with Laurus nobilis (Cambria S, Tavilla G)

#95. Annex I Habitat: 6110* Rupicolous calcareous or basophilic grasslands of the Alysso-Sedion albi (Iamonico D, Capotorti G)

#96. Annex I Habitat: 6420 Mediterranean tall humid herb grasslands of the Molinio-Holoschoenion (Fiaschi T, Fanfarillo E, Angiolini C)

#97. Annex I Habitat: 6430 Hydrophilous tall herb fringe communities of plains and of the montane to alpine levels (Fiaschi T, Fanfarillo E, Angiolini C)

#98. Annex I Habitat: 8210 Calcareous rocky slopes with chasmophytic vegetation (Morabito A, Musarella CM, Spampinato G)

#99. Annex I Habitat: 92A0 Salix alba and Populus alba galleries (Gianguzzi L, Rocca R, Bazan G)

#100. Annex I Habitat: 9320 Olea and Ceratonia forests (Gianguzzi L, Bazan G)

#101. Annex I Habitat: 9330 Quercus suber forests (Perrino EV)
